txt.en: Dáru Lagúrz can be found in Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should destroy defiled bones and altars of sacrifice in Dáru Lagúrz.
Dáru Lagúrz can be found in Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should destroy defiled bones and altars of sacrifice in Dáru Lagúrz.
Destroy defiled bones and altars of sacrifice in Dáru Lagúrz

At the Broken Houses of Dáru Lagúrz, the kergrim have defiled a sacred place housing the resting dead. Now it is a place filled with their vile altars, where they conduct horrid rituals. Everything the beasts have constructed here must be destroyed if the dead are ever to know peace.

You have destroyed altars and bone piles in Dáru Lagúrz. Those who seek to cleanse the Morgul Vale of the evil that grips it will give thanks for your deeds this day, for it is a beginning, though there is still more to do.
Destroyed many defiled bones and altars of sacrifice in Dáru Lagúrz.
The Kergrim of the Morgul Vale have taken control of the old burial houses Gondor had once constructed for Minas Ithil.
